item.description: Jobs Board Kenya - Jobs Advertisement Website - Advertise Jobs Vacancy - Find the Right Candidates for the Job. Find legitimate jobs in kenya. No scam. Find the Latest Jobs in Kenya 2018. Find all jobs in counties within Kenyan Boundaries. Latest Jobs, Internships and Volunteer Programs in Nairobi, Nakuru, Mombasa and Kenya in General. item.title: IDAWN BLOG
item.description: Many applicant tracking systems have been designed and developed but still, plenty of limitations still exists. an applicant tracking system(ATS) is a systems that tracks job seekers information and recommends candidates who fulfill desired qualities to the employers while filtering candidates who do not meet expectations.this post describes how tyou can successfully choose the best applicant tracking systems.

item.title: IDAWN BLOG
item.description: The question of whether millennial job seekers want money or fame has confused lots of people across nations. Naturally, it is evident that a millennial job seekers wants money rather than fame, but if you could observe keenly, a majority of millennial job seekers seem to desire popularity, as exposed in social media.

item.title: IDAWN BLOG
item.description: The three most important words that make interactions healthy in our workplaces include thank you, please and sorry. As we grows older, we tend to forget that they play a great role in shaping us towards positive living. These words, if used well will bring us joy, togetherness and positive growth. The use of the words show how much we care for each other as human beings

item.title: IDAWN BLOG
item.description: The question as to what most young job seekers look for in a job has been lingering in many people. In a effort to find answers to the question posed, we found it critical to conduct extensive research. The question would be to find out whether the entry level job seekers want money or fame. In our research, the target audience was mainly youth age bracket.

item.title: IDAWN BLOG
item.description: A recruitment agency is a firm, a company or organization that has been hired to search, identify and hire the best employees on behalf of the employer. In simple terms, the agency is paid for every suitable candidate hired into an organization’s payroll.
